description_top: Maḥzor for the entire year (rite of Aragon) with additional texts in the margins
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Maḥzor for the entire year (rite of Aragon) with additional texts in the margins
description: In the margins: Yiśraʾel ben Yosef ha-Yiśraʾeli, Mitsṿot Zemanit (ff. 1r-338r). Perush Seder Avodah (ff. 341r-373r). Jacob ben Asher, Ṭur (Oraḥ Ḥayim, Hilkhot Taʿanit tsibur) (ff. 374v-430v).
